price: Mu vy’ukuri, Twaramumenyesheje Turanamutomorera inzira y’ubugororotsi n’iy’ubuhuvyi, iy’ivyiza n’iy’ibibi. Kubera ivyo rero, ashobora guhitamwo kwemera Imana Allah, agashima ivyiza Yamuhaye, canke akagarariza Iyamuremye, agahakana inema zayo.
arabic: إِنَّا هَدَيۡنَٰهُ ٱلسَّبِيلَ إِمَّا شَاكِرٗا وَإِمَّا كَفُورًا

meta.transliteration: innā hadaynāhu al-sabīla immā shākiran wa-immā kafūran
